definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]

sentences.english: They compiled thousands of case history to prove the relationship between smoking and cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他们收集了数以千计的病历来证明吸烟与癌症的关系。

sentences.english: The old chart should accompany the patient from the ER to the patient ward where he's admitted.
sentences.chinese: 旧病历应伴着病人从急诊室送人病房。

sentences.english: Methods:Review the boby temperature and clinical material of the 200 patients after surgery.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾分析200例术后病人的体温及病历资料。

sentences.english: Students should hand in the anamnesis record sheet.
Computer-based Patient Record (CPR) is the trend of hospital information system.
sentences.chinese: 电子病历是病院信息体系的发铺趋势。

sentences.english: One of the careers she's considering has something to do with computerized medical record-keeping.
sentences.chinese: 她正在考虑的一个职业与计算机化病历记录有关。

sentences.english: He was deluded, vividly hallucinated, and unable to give any coherent history.
sentences.chinese: 他迷妄，有生动的幻觉，并且不能说出连贯的病历。

sentences.english: In terms of EMRs, we now have two antithetical requirements.
sentences.chinese: 对于电子病历，我们有两个互相矛盾的需求。

sentences.english: A medical institution shall properly keep the medical record cards of patients.
sentences.chinese: 医疗机构应当妥善地保管病人的病历卡。

sentences.english: Therefore, in our country, more and more people are aware of the importance of CPR.
sentences.chinese: 在海内，越来越多的人开始熟习到电子病历的主要性。

sentences.english: Methods A retrospective analysis was made to 168 cases with clavicular fracture.
sentences.chinese: 方法对168例锁骨骨折的病历资料进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: Reaching for thewrong lab slip, writing the incorrect date on a medical chart.
sentences.chinese: 拿错化验单，在病历上写错日期。

sentences.english: Determine previous baseline SpO2 from client's record.
sentences.chinese: 根据病历记录确定先前动脉血氧饱和度基线。

sentences.english: All case history sheet paper has been used up.
sentences.chinese: 病历表用纸都已经用完了。

sentences.english: Married, they often tore up the previous medical history or the medical records hidden in her family.
sentences.chinese: 结婚时，他们常常撕毁以前的病历或把病历藏在娘家。

sentences.english: Married, they often tore up the previous medical history or the medical records hidden in her family.
sentences.chinese: 结婚时，他们常常撕毁以前的病历或把病历藏在娘家。

definition: to register (at a hospital etc)/to send by registered mail
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
